p: Mean temperature during January and February 2020, attack rate until March 21, and case fatality rate until March 21 are given in Table 1. The case fatality rate was highest in Italy (8.57%) followed by Indonesia (8.09%), Iran (7.29%), Iraq (7.25%), Spain (5.01%), the UK (4.44%), China (4.00%), France (3.56%), and the Netherlands (3.54%) ( Table 1).
